reviewText: I had never seen this movie before. It is not her usual song and dance. It is a very good movie. Good acting and a good story. One of my goals it to have all of her movies.
Title: The Big Show

reviewText: A standard circus flick--some good acts--boring plot. Esther Williams looked great==dry! Time in water-approximately 62 seconds.OK--maybe 75 seconds! Great trivia question potential.
Title: The Big Show

reviewText: This is a review only in the sense that I amcomplaining that Fox has to stop releasingwidescreen films on dvd in pan & scan.I have been sending emails and calling:1. 888. 223. 4369.Please call Fox and register your complaints.
summary: another Pan & Scan from Fox Cinema Archives
Title: The Big Show

reviewText: Esther Williams is my favorite movie star plus the movies is rather exciting if you  enjoy circus acts.  Plus a love interest that leads to marriage.  Good to see the many thrilling acts also.
Title: The Big Show

reviewText: It's okay  not as good as I hoped for. I collect many "circus" films and films with Esther Williams. So I was not sure what to expect. It's Esther's final film, no swimming in it.. It's really about a family member who released from prison, wants revenge. Other side stories deals with a member in love but doesn't not get the okay from the father The circus acts are great to watch., but I was hoping for more. You may like it. Try it at netflix or other movie rebtal site before buying.
Title: The Big Show
